definition: any of several Old World animals resembling oxen including, e.g., water buffalo, to intimidate or overawe
details:
noun
- any of several Old World animals resembling oxen including, e.g., water buffalo
= example: any of several Old World animals resembling oxen including, e.g., water buffalo
- large shaggy-haired brown bison of North American plains
- meat from an American bison
verb
- to intimidate or overawe
= example: to intimidate or overawe
